messages.content: You are a helpful assistant whose goal is to read in the user's paragraph and break the paragraph into separate lines of independent information, ensuring each line can be read without prior context. Each line should start with a clear subject and avoid using pronouns that refer to other lines.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: Downtown Tampa is undergoing significant development and redevelopment in line with a general national trend toward urban residential development. In April 2007, the Tampa Downtown Partnership noted development proceeding on 20 residential, hotel, and mixed-use projects.[128] Many of the new downtown developments were nearing completion in the midst of a housing market slump, which caused numerous projects to be delayed or revamped, and some of the 20 projects TDP lists have not broken ground and are being refinanced.

Downtown Tampa is undergoing significant development and redevelopment.
Tampa Downtown Partnership noted development on 20 residential, hotel, and mixed-use projects in April 2007.
Many of the new downtown developments were nearing completion despite a housing market slump.
Some of the 20 projects listed by TDP have not broken ground and are being refinanced.

You are a helpful assistant whose goal is to read in the user's paragraph and break the paragraph into separate lines of independent information, ensuring each line can be read without prior context. Each line should start with a clear subject and avoid using pronouns that refer to other lines.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: New York, often called New York City[b] or simply NYC, is the most populous city in the United States, located at the southern tip of New York State on one of the world's largest natural harbors. The city comprises five boroughs, each of which is coextensive with a respective county. New York is a global center of finance[10] and commerce, culture and technology,[11] entertainment and media, academics and scientific output,[12] and the arts and fashion, and, as home to the headquarters of the United Nations, is an important center for international diplomacy.[13][14][15][16][17] New York City is the center of the world's principal metropolitan economy.[18]

New York is often called New York City or simply NYC.
New York City is the most populous city in the United States.
NYC is located at the southern tip of New York State on one of the world's largest natural harbors.
The city comprises five boroughs, each coextensive with a respective county.
New York is a global center of finance, commerce, culture, technology, entertainment, media, academics, scientific output, the arts, and fashion.
NYC is home to the headquarters of the United Nations.
New York City is an important center for international diplomacy.
NYC is the center of the world's principal metropolitan economy.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate (Köppen Cfa), although due to its location on the Florida peninsula on Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico, it shows some characteristics of a tropical climate. Tampa's climate generally features hot and humid summers with frequent thunderstorms and dry and mild winters. Average highs range from 71 to 91 °F (22 to 33 °C) year round, and lows 53 to 77 °F (12 to 25 °C). The city of Tampa is split between two USDA climate zones. According to the 2012 USDA Plant Hardiness Zone Map, Tampa is listed as USDA zone 9b north of Kennedy Boulevard away from the bay and 10a near the shorelines and in the interbay peninsula south of Kennedy Boulevard. Zone 10a is about the northern limit of where coconut palms and royal palms can be grown, although some specimens do grow in northern Tampa. Recently, certain palm tree species in the area, along with the rest of the state, have been and continue to be severely affected by a plant disease called Texas phoenix palm decline, which has caused a considerable amount of damage to various local palm tree landscapes and threatens the native palm tree species in the region.

The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate (Köppen Cfa).
The area shows some characteristics of a tropical climate due to its location on the Florida peninsula on Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico.
Tampa's climate features hot and humid summers with frequent thunderstorms.
Tampa experiences dry and mild winters.
Average highs range from 71 to 91 °F year-round.
Average lows range from 53 to 77 °F.
The city of Tampa is split between two USDA climate zones.
Tampa is listed as USDA zone 9b north of Kennedy Boulevard.
Tampa is listed as USDA zone 10a near the shorelines and in the interbay peninsula south of Kennedy Boulevard.
Zone 10a marks the northern limit for growing coconut palms and royal palms.
Some coconut palms and royal palms do grow in northern Tampa.
Certain palm tree species in Tampa have been severely affected by Texas phoenix palm decline.
Texas phoenix palm decline has caused significant damage to various local palm tree landscapes.
The disease threatens native palm tree species in the region.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: Though threatened by tropical systems almost every hurricane season (which runs from June 1 to November 30), Tampa seldom feels major effects from tropical storms or hurricanes. No hurricane has made landfall in the immediate Tampa Bay area since the category 4 1921 Tampa Bay hurricane made landfall near Tarpon Springs and caused extensive damage throughout the region.

Tampa is threatened by tropical systems almost every hurricane season.
Tampa seldom feels major effects from tropical storms or hurricanes.
No hurricane has made landfall in the immediate Tampa Bay area since the category 4 1921 Tampa Bay hurricane.
The 1921 Tampa Bay hurricane made landfall near Tarpon Springs.
The 1921 Tampa Bay hurricane caused extensive damage throughout the region.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: Tampa was founded as a military center during the 19th century with the establishment of Fort Brooke. The cigar industry was also brought to the city by Vincente Martinez Ybor, after whom Ybor City is named. Tampa was reincorporated as a city in 1887 following the Civil War. Tampa's economy is driven by tourism, health care, finance, insurance, technology, construction, and the maritime industry.[12] The bay's port is the largest in the state, responsible for over $15 billion in economic impact.[13]

Tampa was founded as a military center during the 19th century with the establishment of Fort Brooke.
The cigar industry was brought to Tampa by Vincente Martinez Ybor.
Ybor City is named after Vincente Martinez Ybor.
Tampa was reincorporated as a city in 1887 following the Civil War.
Tampa's economy is driven by tourism, health care, finance, insurance, technology, construction, and the maritime industry.
The bay's port is the largest in the state.
The port is responsible for over $15 billion in economic impact.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: Taylor Alison Swift (born December 13, 1989) is an American singer-songwriter. A subject of widespread public interest with a vast fanbase, she has influenced the music industry, popular culture, and politics through her songwriting, artistry, entrepreneurship, and advocacy.

Taylor Alison Swift was born on December 13, 1989.
Taylor Swift is an American singer-songwriter.
She is a subject of widespread public interest.
Taylor Swift has a vast fanbase.
She has influenced the music industry.
Taylor Swift has influenced popular culture.
Taylor Swift has influenced politics through her songwriting, artistry, entrepreneurship, and advocacy.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: Tampa has a diverse culinary scene from small cafes and bakeries to bistros and farm-to-table restaurants. The food of Tampa has a history of Cuban, Spanish, Floribbean and Italian cuisines. There are also many Colombian, Puerto Rican, Vietnamese and barbecue restaurants. Seafood is very popular in Tampa, and Greek cuisine is prominent in the area, including around Tarpon Springs. Food trucks are popular, and the area holds the record for the world's largest food truck rally. In addition to Ybor, the areas of Seminole Heights and South Tampa are known for their restaurants.

Tampa has a diverse culinary scene.
Tampa's food has a history of Cuban, Spanish, Floribbean, and Italian cuisines.
There are many Colombian, Puerto Rican, Vietnamese, and barbecue restaurants in Tampa.
Seafood is popular in Tampa.
Greek cuisine is prominent in the Tampa area.
Tampa hosts the world's largest food truck rally.
Seminole Heights and South Tampa are known for their restaurants, in addition to Ybor.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: The Civil War ended in April 1865 with a Confederate defeat. In May 1865, federal troops arrived in Tampa to occupy the fort and the town as part of Reconstruction. They remained until August 1869.[citation needed] During the immediate post-war period, Tampa was a poor, isolated fishing village with about 1000 residents and little industry. Yellow fever, borne by mosquitoes from nearby swamps, broke out several times during the 1860s and 1870s, causing more residents to leave.[44] In 1869, residents voted to abolish the city of Tampa government.[45]

The Civil War ended in April 1865 with a Confederate defeat.
Federal troops arrived in Tampa in May 1865.
The troops occupied the fort and town as part of Reconstruction until August 1869.
During the immediate post-war period, Tampa was a poor, isolated fishing village.
Tampa had about 1000 residents and little industry at the time.
Yellow fever outbreaks occurred in the 1860s and 1870s.
Residents voted to abolish the city of Tampa government in 1869.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: Downtown Tampa is undergoing significant development and redevelopment in line with a general national trend toward urban residential development. In April 2007, the Tampa Downtown Partnership noted development proceeding on 20 residential, hotel, and mixed-use projects.[128] Many of the new downtown developments were nearing completion in the midst of a housing market slump, which caused numerous projects to be delayed or revamped, and some of the 20 projects TDP lists have not broken ground and are being refinanced. Nonetheless, several developments were completed, making downtown into a 24-hour neighborhood instead of a 9 to 5 business district.[129] As of 2010, Tampa residents faced a decline in rent of 2%. Nationally rent had decreased 4%.[130] The Tampa Business Journal found Tampa to be the number two city for real estate investment in 2014.[131]

Downtown Tampa is undergoing significant development and redevelopment.
Tampa Downtown Partnership noted development proceeding on 20 residential, hotel, and mixed-use projects in April 2007.
Many new downtown developments were nearing completion during a housing market slump.
The housing market slump caused numerous projects to be delayed or revamped.
Some of the 20 projects listed by TDP have not broken ground and are being refinanced.
Several developments were completed, turning downtown into a 24-hour neighborhood.
As of 2010, Tampa residents faced a 2% decline in rent.
Nationally, rent had decreased by 4%.
The Tampa Business Journal found Tampa to be the number two city for real estate investment in 2014.

Obtain and write out all independent points of information in the following paragraph: There are a number of institutions of higher education in Tampa. The city is home to the main campus of the University of South Florida (USF), a member of the State University System of Florida founded in 1956.[193] USF is classified among 'R1: Doctoral Universities – Very high research activity' and is one of only three universities in Florida designated as a Preeminent State Research University.[194][195] As of 2021, USF has the seventh highest undergraduate enrollment in the U.S. with over 51,000 students.[196]

There are institutions of higher education in Tampa.
The main campus of the University of South Florida (USF) is in Tampa.
USF is classified among 'R1: Doctoral Universities – Very high research activity'.
USF is one of three universities in Florida designated as a Preeminent State Research University.
As of 2021, USF has the seventh highest undergraduate enrollment in the U.S.
